item.title: STOIC: Imperial’s student run TV station
item.author: STOIC,
item.description: “STOIC, you’re the philosophy society right?” Is a question I receive many times throughout the course of the year. The latest being at Freshers’ Fair while standing in front of a large AutoCue, professional video camera and a TV playing a showreel of our best bits. While I do have a particular love …
